name: Susan B
text: After submitting an online inquiry for quotes regarding a huge oil slick in the garage, Devin called promptly & explained options. Several days later we scheduled the appt. in which he was on time & prepared. As mentioned in conversation, he explained the type of acid may not be strong enough for the severity of stain but worth a try. Initially it appeared most of it came off. I was very pleased & his amount charged was quite fair. However, once it dried, the stain was still prominent. Definitely not his fault, I do plan to contact him again down the road & we'll try the stronger solution. Very nice & knowledgeable, you can't go wrong

name: Chris Roberts
text: We really like the results after soft washing our house and pressure washing our very dirty driveway. I fully recommend NOVELLI pressure washing services and plan to use them next time we need cleaning services.

name: Dannethia Little
text: I got this awesome Power Wash company from Angi list. Very professional, respect and reliable. I had got another quote from another company twice the price. Awesome job. Thank you Devin.

name: Christopher Gibson
text: Devin has done a great job for power-washing overall process was smooth told him what areas needed work on and he did an outstanding job would recommend him in the future.

name: David Thompson
text: I'm extremely satisfied with the work Novelli did on our home. They pressure washed our siding, driveway, and deck, and everything looks incredible. The attention to detail was impressive.

name: Jennifer Martinez
text: Novelli Pressure Washing transformed our restaurant's exterior and patio area. Their commercial cleaning service was thorough and efficient. Our customers have been commenting on how clean everything looks!
